articles.description: Rangers take a 2-1 lead to Switzerland for the second leg of their Champions League third qualifying round tie with Servette.
articles.title: Build-up as Rangers face Servette in Champions League qualifying

articles.description: Ben Stokes' return to the England one-day side for the defence of the World Cup in India will be confirmed on Wednesday.
articles.title: Stokes to come out of ODI retirement for World Cup

articles.description: Paris St-Germain sell Neymar to Saudi Pro League side Al-Hilal for a fee of about 90m euros (£77.6m) plus add-ons.
articles.title: Neymar completes Al-Hilal move from PSG

articles.description: Follow text and radio commentary as Oval Invincibles face London Spirit in the 2023 Men's Hundred.
articles.title: The Hundred: Oval Invincibles v London Spirit - radio & text

articles.description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola says Kevin de Bruyne could miss the next four months of the season as the club decide whether he needs surgery on a hamstring injury.
articles.title: De Bruyne to miss up to four months of season

articles.description: England and Australia are both hoping to make history by reaching the Women's World Cup final for the first time when they meet in Sydney on Wednesday.
articles.title: England & Australia prepare for epic semi-final

articles.description: London Spirit's Amelia Kerr seals a 21-run victory over Oval Invincibles with a fantastic caught and bowled at The Oval in The Hundred.
articles.title: Kerr catches 'screamer' with final ball of the match

articles.description: England captain Owen Farrell is clear to play in the World Cup after his red card in Saturday's warm-up with Wales is overturned.
articles.title: England captain Farrell's red card overturned

articles.description: Spain beat Sweden to reach their first Women's World Cup final in a dramatic finish in Auckland.
articles.title: Spain beat Sweden in dramatic finish to reach final

articles.description: Chelsea are poised to sign France Under-21 winger Michael Olise from Crystal Palace for a fee in the region of £35m.
articles.title: Chelsea set to sign Olise from Crystal Palace
